questions.question_text: Customer Service Trending Topics is a capability that enables companies to use Predictive Intelligence to quickly pinpoint factors driving up case volume and act to mitigate them. Which of the following would be a benefit of using Predictive Intelligence Customer Service Trending Topics?

choices.A: Eliminate the need for more traditional performance analytics
choices.D: A guaranteed reduction in call volume per month
choices.C: Create root cause solutions for similar cases
choices.B: Auto-generate clusters of cases that point to similar underlying issues

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
E-book p√°g 157.

https://evantage.gilmoreglobal.com/reader/books/SN-CSMI-T010-PG-E/pageid/156

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
b is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/trending-case-topics.html

Selected Answer: ABE
ABE Is Correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/integrate-csm-other-applics.html

Selected Answer: ABE
Answer:
 A. Service Portfolio Management
 B. Project Management
 E. ITOM Event Management

Explanation: Customer Service Management provides integrations with the following applications:
 - Request, Incident, Problem, and Change Management
 - Service Portfolio Management (a)
 - Continual Improvement Management
 - Field Service Management
 - ITOM Event Management (c)
 - Customer Project Management (b)
 - Financial Management
 - Adobe Experience Manager
 - Computer Telephony Integration (CTI)
 - Microsoft Outlook
 - Process Optimization
 - Safe Workplace applications, such as Employee Health Screening
 - Consumer messaging apps, including WhatsApp, Google Business Messages, and - Facebook Messenger

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/integrate-csm-other-applics.html

Selected Answer: ABE
abe
